title: Portland Precipitation: Center of a Time Plot
question_text: The graph below shows the average amount of precipitation (in inches) for Portland, Oregon for each month throughout the year. Created for Albert.io. Copyright 2016. All rights reserved. Based on the graph, what is the best estimate of the center for the distribution of precipitation?

choices.text: The center of the distribution cannot be determined from a time plot.
The center of the distribution cannot be determined because month is a categorical variable.
